Package it.polimi.ingsw.editor

Class LeaderCardEditController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.editor.LeaderCardEditController
public class LeaderCardEditController
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used by the client to edit the leader card. he can create a new leader card with a different id. Or he can change the parameter of an existing leader card. The type of resource , the special ability, the victory points and the requirements can be edited.

    • makeCostMap

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> makeCostMap()

      Returns:
      requirement map

    • writeFile

      public void writeFile​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> costs, java.lang.Integer pointVic, java.lang.Integer idCard, java.lang.String special, java.lang.String resource)
      Writes the changes on the json file. It adds a new leader card if the id isn't present already otherwise it changes an existing leader card
      Parameters:
      costs - requirements map
      pointVic - victory points
      idCard - the id of the card
      special - the ability of the card
      resource - the resource of the card
